hero.imageAlt: AI image of my previous style with blond hair
hero.description: Focused on creating functional and well-structured solutions.
hero.completeDescription: I enjoy transforming ideas into real projects using modern tools and continuously growing professionally.

description: Developed mobile user interfaces using React Native.
Consumed APIs and handled requests and service integrations.
Implemented custom hooks to optimize component logic and code reusability.
Contributed to the development of an administrative portal mobile application based on an existing system.

items.position: Community Service â€“ ICT and Technical Support
description: Supported academic projects related to Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) and testing environments.
Developed and maintained a smart home assistant system designed for people with hearing disabilities.
Designed, cabled, and configured network infrastructure, including internet distribution from racks to computer equipment.
Installed, configured, and maintained IP and analog security cameras, including DVR troubleshooting and repairs.
Configured academic testing environments and provided technical support for software and hardware.

items.name: Spotify-Insights-with-Elasticsearch
items.description: Big Data analysis using Elasticsearch on a Spotify songs dataset. It allows querying features such as duration, energy, and valence, and visualizing results in Jupyter Notebooks. The entire environment (Elasticsearch and Kibana) runs in Docker containers.

items.name: Snakify
items.description: Frontend project developed for an e-commerce platform focused on selling desserts in local stores. It allows user interaction with the interface, leaving room for future backend integration.

items.name: C-Ita
items.description: Frontend project developed in Kotlin, focused on creating a Facebook-style social network for ITA students. It enables user interaction through posts, using both a local SQLite database and an external Node.js API connected to a MySQL database.

items.name: Meet2go
items.description: Cross-platform mobile application developed with React Native and Supabase to connect people with similar interests and organize group events. It includes user profiles, event management, and a real-time chat system based on an Express microservice deployed on Heroku.

stack.title: Tech Stack
stack.description: My tech stack focuses on frontend and backend development, as well as data management, allowing me to build complete and well-structured applications.
stack.completeDescription: This technical foundation gives me the flexibility to adapt to different needs, integrate multiple technologies, and deliver functional and scalable solutions.

items.name: Bachelor's in Information and Communications Technologies Engineering
items.description: Student in training with a focus on software development, networking, databases, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity. Participated in academic projects, tech competitions, and hands-on practices with modern tools in the technology ecosystem.

items.name: CCNA: Enterprise Networking, Security, and Automation
items.description: Completed course on scalable network architectures, dynamic routing, security threat mitigation, wide area networks (WAN), virtualization, and programmable network automation.

items.name: Linux Unhatched
items.description: Certification in basic Linux terminal usage, navigating system directories, creating, deleting, and moving files, writing simple scripts, and managing file permissions and ownership.

items.name: CCNA: Switching, Routing, and Wireless Fundamentals
items.description: Comprehensive course on switching operations, configuring wired and wireless LANs using best security practices, redundancy protocols, and developing problem-solving skills.

items.name: Introduction to Data Science
items.description: Completed course on basic data science concepts. Gained general understanding of data analytics, data engineering, data science, and job roles related to AI and machine learning, along with a broad overview of professional opportunities in these areas.

items.name: CCNA: Introduction to Networks
items.description: Completed course on network fundamentals. Acquired knowledge in IP addressing, Ethernet functionality, switching, subnetting, and configuring connectivity between switches, routers, and end devices.

identity.text: I am Emmanuel MartÃ­nez, a student of Information and Communication Technologies Engineering. Passionate about turning ideas into real solutions.

focus.text: I explore how systems work. I aim to make good technical decisions and continuously improve.

values.text: Curious and persevering. I believe in continuous improvement, learning from mistakes, and the value of well-done work and collaboration.
